tweet: visited Taj. Tea @ sea lounge was awesome! Great memories. Great food/service as always.
heading to phoenix mills for bowling and lunch. Then to Oberoi trident for afternoon tea.
I love the Oberoi trident. It has a GREAT view. But everytime I eat there or even drink tea (like i did yesterday) I get a stomach upset :(
The view from the rooftop @ the oberoi trident is the best view I've had of Bombay.
raining REALLY hard in mumbai. Traffic jammed. Lets see if I can get to the airport.
